description: Single storey rear extension; alterations to existing shopfront; formation of new residential side entrance; first floor rear terrace with associated timber screening and further associated external alterations
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 319_001 (Rev. D) - Location Plan, 319_005 (Rev. C) - Site Plan, 319_010 (Rev. F) - Existing Ground Floor Plan, 319_011 (Rev. G) - Existing First Floor Plan, 319_012 (Rev. G) - Existing Second Floor Plan, 319_013 (Rev. E) - Existing Roof Plan, 319_020 (Rev. D) - Existing Section A, 319_021 (Rev. D) - Existing Section B, 319_022 (Rev. D) - Existing Section C, 319_030 (Rev. D) - Existing Front Elevation, 319_031 (Rev. D) - Existing Rear Elevation, 319_032 (Rev. D) - Existing Side Elevation, 319_01_110 (Rev. A) - Proposed Ground Floor, 319_01_111 (Rev. A) - Proposed First Floor Plan, 319_01_112 (Rev. A) - Proposed Second Floor Plan, 319_01_113 (Rev. A) - Proposed Roof Plan, 319_01_120 (Rev. A) - Proposed Section A, 319_01_121 (Rev. A) - Proposed Section B, 319_01_122 (Rev. A) - Proposed Section C, 319_01_130 (Rev. A) - Proposed Front Elevation, 319_01_131 (Rev. A) - Proposed Rear Elevation, 319_01_132 (Rev. A) - Proposed Side Elevation, Covering Letter prepared by DGW Planning (dated 22/11/2019)

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and the Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 2.1 (a) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Aside from the first-floor terrace with associated screening hereby approved, no other part of the roof of the development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The rating sound level emitted from the external plant and machinery at the development hereby approved, as assessed under BS4142: 2014, shall not exceed the existing background sound level, as measured at the nearest noise sensitive facades, during the relevant periods of operation.

Reason: To safeguard future and existing occupiers of the area against unacceptable noise and disturbance, in accordance with policies 3.5 and 7.15 of the London Plan (2016), policies 1.1(j) of the Ealing Development (or Core) Strategy (2012), Local Variation policy 3.5 and policy 7A of Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
